Address.value: 7887 EAST BELLEVIEW AVENUE,SUITE 1000, ENGLEWOOD, Colorado, 80111, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: WideOpenWest Inc is a cable operator and broadband service, provider. The company serves residential, business and wholesale customers in Illinois, Michigan, Indiana, Ohio, Kansas, Tennessee, Maryland, and South Carolina. Its service portfolio consists of high-speed internet, data, voice, cloud, and cable television services. The company operates in one business segment that is Broadband Services. The majority of the revenue is generated from the subscription service revenue received.
